name: Labyrinthos (itch) (Dylan Shorten, Alexander McGarrity)
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam with the theme "Every 10 seconds"

We would love for you to head over to Ludum Dare 51 page and rate the game! (ratings close at 9am AEDT on 22nd October 2022)

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/labyrinthos

NOTE!

The lighting in the browser game doesn't work as intented so be sure to download the game for an improved experience!

CONTROLS (Keyboard/Gamepad):

WASD/Left Stick - Move

Mouse/Right Stick - Aim 

Left Click/RB - Shoot

Right Click/R3  - Melee

Space/LB - Dash

E/X - Weapon Pickup
